title: Exploring Unsafe Rust Superpowers
description: In this lab, we will explore unsafe Rust, a feature that allows us to bypass the memory safety guarantees enforced at compile time and gives us extra superpowers, while also understanding the risks and responsibilities involved in using it.

meta.title: Unsafe Rust | Rust Programming | Memory Safety
meta.description: Explore the world of Unsafe Rust, a powerful feature in the Rust programming language that allows you to bypass memory safety guarantees and unlock new capabilities.
meta.keywords: Unsafe Rust, Rust Programming, Memory Safety, Low-Level Systems Programming, Compiler Optimization

i18n.title: 探索不安全的 Rust 的超能力
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索不安全的 Rust，这是一项允许我们绕过编译时强制执行的内存安全保证并赋予我们额外超能力的特性，同时理解使用它所涉及的风险和责任。

meta.title: 不安全的 Rust | Rust 编程 | 内存安全
meta.description: 探索不安全的 Rust 的世界，这是 Rust 编程语言中的一项强大特性，它允许你绕过内存安全保证并解锁新功能。
meta.keywords: 不安全的 Rust，Rust 编程，内存安全，低级系统编程，编译器优化
